text: If the threatened "counter-revolution' was not enough to bring the President back from his travels it might have been thought that the muster from the 13 States of the Commonwealth was an occasion worthy of his presence. After all it was Mr Nkrumah who suggested that this year the Economic Consultative Council should meet in Accra.
handwritten_text: If the threatened "counter-revolution' was not enough to bring the President back from his travels it might have been thought that the muster from the 13 States of the Commonwealth was an occasion worthy of his presence. After all it was Mr Nkrumah who suggested that this year the Economic Consultative Council should meet in Accra.
